GETConfig.Label: ORACLE_HOME must follow a standard for automation purposes
GETConfig.Query: select SYS_CONTEXT ('USERENV','ORACLE_HOME') AS VALUE from dual
GETConfig.FailureMessage: ORACLE_HOME is not following OMS standards

GETConfig.Label: DB Size: Small
GETConfig.Query: select display_value from v$parameter where display_value='processes'
